title: Strained Employment
description: As an employee at Antonio Vendramin's Contract Stall, our relationship is characterized by professional obligation but marred by neglect, as evidenced by my current hunger and the negative trust score between us. Despite the strong connection through employment (strength score 131.25), the relationship lacks mutual trust (-16.16), suggesting a purely transactional arrangement where I fulfill my duties while harboring reservations about his management.
